title: Jue Shi Wu Hun
synopsis: In the continent of Longmai, thousands of clans stand tall, countless sects exist, and cultivation is the way of life. The strong can do anything they want while the weaklings live like ants. Youngster Chen Feng has an incomplete dan region, causing him to be unable to cultivate, he withstood countless sneers directed at him. Until he obtained a mysterious dragon bloodline, breaking out of his cocoon and opening a new chapter to his life!
